name: RUN GUN ZR
description:
A new take on the Infinite Runner, now in VR.
Dodge, Jump, and Vault with both hands as you make your way through infinite obstacles and Zombies.
Unlock more weapons to help you progress further.

How far will you go?

Maps are randomly generated, so you'll get a different layout each time.
The only thing you can count on, is eventual death.

Please Join Us On Discord, to make this a better game:


https://discord.gg/TpParVzReM



It’s VR, designed for full room-scale/standing tracking with motion controllers. Simple controls allow seated, or less mobile players.
  • To Jump, Press B
  • If you have a bad back, press A to Duck.
  • If you don't have room to dodge, use the Thumbstick.
  • If you can't swing your arms up and down, press both jump buttons to vault.
  • If you can't swing your arms around..... don't select the melee weapons.

The Game has been played on Valve Index, HTC Vive, and Quest 2 (including Virtual Desktop)
